articles.title: Talks between Foreign Ministers of DPRK, Cuba Held
articles.content:
Talks between Foreign Ministers of DPRK, Cuba Held
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho who is leading the government delegation on an official visit to Cuba and Cuban Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla at the building of the Cuban Foreign Ministry on Wednesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and from the Cuban side were officials concerned of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 At the talks the two foreign ministers expressed the steadfast will to further consolidate the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by the preceding leaders and being successfully developed by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and Comrade Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 Ri Yong Ho referred to the acute situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula owing to the imperialists' military moves and stressed that the DPRK would bolster up its defense capability to cope with the U.S. hostile policy and blackmail.
					
					 Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla mentioned the people's struggle for sovereignty, independence and right to self-determination and the right to establishment of one's own style political, economic, social and cultural system and non-interference.
					
					 Both sides strongly rejected the arbitrary practice of the U.S. which re-designated the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" as a wanton violation of international law.
					
					 On the same day Ri Yong Ho met and had a talk with persons concerned of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, the Cuban Foreign Ministry and solidarity organization.

articles.title: U.S. Should Withdraw Re-listing of DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism"
articles.content:
U.S. Should Withdraw Re-listing of DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism"
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The People in the DPRK are afire with anti-U.S. feelings, upon receiving the statement a spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee issued as regards Trump's announcement made at the ministerial-level meeting held in the White House on Nov. 21 to re-list the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism". 
					 They strongly denounce the U.S. for making desperate efforts to isolate and stifle the peace-loving DPRK by branding it as a "murderous regime" supporting international terrorism and by "demonizing" it.
					
					 Jong Hui Chol, an official of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, told KCNA:
					
					 The U.S. behavior reminds everyone of a thief crying "Stop thief!"
					
					 The DPRK is fulfilling its responsibility and duty for rooting out terrorism, as a member of the international community. But, the U.S., the biggest sponsor and supporter of terrorism in the world, is desperately keen on the moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, asserting itself that the DPRK is a "sponsor of terrorism".
					
					 Such tragedy should never be allowed to continue. The international community should decide on all the crimes committed by the U.S., the kingpin of terrorism which has openly committed all sorts of terrorism like state-sponsored terrorism, seized with wild ambition for dominating the world, and force it to pay dearly for the crimes.
					
					 Kim Kuk Jin, a worker of the Kumsong Tractor Factory, said:
					
					 Though Trump clamored for a series of additional maximum sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK, it can never work on our working class. The louder the old mad dog barks, the stronger our belief in our might will grow. And with this belief we will firmly advance toward the final victory.
					
					 An Jong Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army (KPA), said:
					
					 The U.S. should immediately withdraw its gangster-like measure that re-listed the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism".
					
					 The U.S. outrage to terminate our sacred socialist Korea makes every KPA serviceperson burn with the strong will to exterminate the enemies.
					
					 The U.S. had better ponder over the fact that the DPRK will make further countermeasures in step with its future behavior.

articles.title: U.S. Introduction of Strategic Assets Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. Introduction of Strategic Assets Flayed
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Jong Nam Hyok, researcher at the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, in a commentary Friday disclosed the danger of the U.S. move to send its strategic assets towards the Korean peninsula.
					 Saying that centuries-long nuclear blackmail and intimidation of the U.S. against the DPRK have now reached the zenith, the commentary noted that the U.S. introduction of its strategic assets has got more provocative and dangerous in the estimation of its round, size and content than before, though it is less than 1 year since Trump took office. It went on:
					
					 No one can vouch that the U.S. moves will not lead to a preemptive nuclear attack and total war against the DPRK any moment.
					
					 The above-said U.S. actions were prompted by its strategic calculation to keep a firm hold on Japan and south Korean puppet forces, speed up the triangular military alliance with them and militarily pressurize and contain potential foes, China and Russia.
					
					 Such moves are further fanning up arms race in the Northeast Asian region as they are destabilizing the region.
					
					 The U.S. increasing nuclear blackmail and threat have made the DPRK keenly feel the justness of its line of simultaneously developing the two fronts and compelled it to speed up the beefing up of its nuclear force for self-defense.

articles.title: Sojourn of Mongolian Guests in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Sojourn of Mongolian Guests in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Baasankhuu Oktyabri, chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group, and his party visited the Sci-Tech Complex.
					 The guests went round the hall for scientific conference, hall of the children's dream and other parts of the complex, being briefed on the fact that the complex was built into a center for spreading modern scientific and technological knowledge.
					
					 They also toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, the Ryugyong Dental Hospital, etc.

articles.title: 7th Anniversary of Victory in Yonphyong Island Shelling Marked
articles.content:
7th Anniversary of Victory in Yonphyong Island Shelling Marked
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- An army-people joint meeting took place in Kangryong County, South Hwanghae Province Thursday to mark the seventh anniversary of the victory in the Yonphyong Island shelling.
					 Present there were men and officers of the Korean Peoples' Army including the servicepersons who took part in the Yonphyong Island shelling, officials and civilians from all walks of life in the county.
					
					 Army Col. General Ri Song Guk, commander of the 4th Corps of the KPA, said in his address that the victory in the Yonphyong Island shelling was a great event as it fully demonstrated the invincible spirit of the KPA and recorded a proud page in the ever-victorious history of Juche Korea. 
					
					 Now the servicepersons standing guard on the biggest hotspot in the southwest sector of the front are filled with the strong will to make a prompt and merciless strike at the enemies and throw them into the waters by carrying forward the tradition of the victory in the Yonphyong Island shelling once an order is issued, he added.
					
					 Kim Pong Hyon, chairman of the Kangryong County Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, warmly congratulated the victors in the shelling battle and expressed the will to annihilate the enemies together with the servicepersons in the same trench if the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors fire even a bullet at the territorial land and waters of the DPRK.
					
					 The floor was taken by others.
					
					 At the end of the meeting there was a concert and march by the Military Band of the KPA.

articles.title: Modernization of Production Processes Brisk in Light Industrial Fields
articles.content:
Modernization of Production Processes Brisk in Light Industrial Fields
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Industrial establishments under the Ministry of Light Industry in the DPRK are concentrating their efforts on putting production process on a modern and scientific basis, as part of the struggle to implement the decisions made at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The Management Bureau for the Shoe-making Industry has made achievements in modernizing equipment at the Pyongyang Shoes Machine Factory and the Shoe-making Technology Center.
					
					 The Wonsan Shoes Factory speeds up the automation of gumming process at the final stage.
					
					 The Phyongsong Artificial Leather Factory pushes ahead with the development of porous vinyl chloride artificial leather and the Pyongyang Tannery with the development of chemical auxiliary materials.
					
					 And the recycling of plastic and rubber is brisk at the Sinuiju Shoes Factory and other units.
					
					 The Textile Machinery Industrial Management Bureau has also made achievements in manufacturing high-efficient weaving machine and accessories.
					
					 The Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory gives an impetus to the development of a flexible rapier loom with higher per-minute rotational frequency.

articles.title: Natural Resources Abundant in Korea
articles.content:
Natural Resources Abundant in Korea
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Korea has rich natural resources from geological point of view, said Prof. and Dr. Choe Won Jong, a researcher of the Geological Institute under the State Academy of Sciences, when interviewed by KCNA.
					 Billions tons of iron ore and vast fields of anthracite coal and bituminous coal lie underground in Korea, he said adding:
					
					 There are rich deposits of nonferrous metals and rare metals as well as those of non-metallic minerals like magnesite, graphite and dolomite in Korea. And the variety of underground minerals reaches over 500 kinds.
					
					 Six kinds of minerals were discovered for the first time in Korea, including holtonite, suanite and sanpaltonite.
					
					 Scientists proved the eternity of the crust through the survey of rock masses and mineral resources formed 3.6 billions of years ago in different parts of the country like the vicinity of the West Sea Barrage and Jagang Province.
					
					 For example, Iron ore deposit in Musan was formed in 2.9-2.7 billions of years ago.
					
					 The most of graphite deposits were formed in 2.5 billions of years ago and nonferrous metal deposits in Tanchon and Hochon areas 2 billions of years ago.
					
					 There is a quality diatomite deposit in Taehongdan County, which is estimated to be formed nearly 1 000 years ago when the crater on Mt Paektu vomited pumice.
					
					 For having rich resources, Korea has been called "a legendary land full of treasures" from olden times.
					
					 In particular, the geological strata of Machon Pass are enough to boast of all over the world, as they have big and rich magnesite, lead-zinc, copper, gold, iron and other mineral resources.
					
					 Korea has also rich marine resources as it is sea-bound on three sides.
					
					 Now, natural resources in the country have been used for putting the national economy on a Juche and self-reliant basis, thanks to the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged at Another Provocation Made by U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged at Another Provocation Made by U.S.
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK are severely condemning the shameless act of Trump group that re-listed the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism".
					 Choe Sun Yong, a department director of the State Science and Technology Commission, told KCNA that it is another hideous provocation against the DPRK to re-list it as a "sponsor of terrorism".
					
					 All the tragic events the international community has witnessed in different parts of the world are the products of the U.S. high-handed practice and plot. Therefore, the humankind has denounced the U.S. as the ringleader of terrorism and the world's biggest sponsor of terrorism which wrecks the global peace and security.
					
					 Even a U.S. newspaper termed its homeland as the world's biggest sponsor of terrorism.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. re-listed the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism", which can be construed otherwise than a revelation of inveterate repugnancy and hostility of the U.S. to stifle the ideology and system of the DPRK, the one and only fortress of socialism in the world.
					
					 The U.S. persistent moves to stifle the DPRK drive the situation on the Korean peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension and sweep all the army and people of the DPRK to angry to make thousand-fold revenge upon it.
					
					 Kong Myong Song, director of the Folklore Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences, said:
					
					 Old lunatic Trump's made a false charge of terrorism against the DPRK again. It is an unethical crime to deprive the DPRK of its sovereignty and rights to existence and development.
					
					 The re-listing of the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" is no more than a last-ditch effort of Trump and his clique who were taken aback by the vigorous advance made by the DPRK despite of sanctions.
					
					 The DPRK will never forgive the reckless U.S. keen on terminating the peace-loving sovereign country for its dirty political ambition.

articles.title: DPRK's Measures for Bolstering Nuclear Force Are Inevitable: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK's Measures for Bolstering Nuclear Force Are Inevitable: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A military twitter of the U.S. recently opened to public that the U.S. has a secret underground nuclear warhead depot and B-1 bombers can drop nuclear warheads. The U.S. is now taking follow-up measures to put the situation under control by letting the media and experts claim that it was "wrong story" and "false assertion".
					 A story carried by the U.S. website VOX on Nov. 16 said that the command in charge of nuclear warehouse in the U.S. on its twitter wrote on Nov. 15 that the U.S. has a secret underground nuclear warhead depot and B-1 bombers can drop nuclear warheads.
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. media and experts immediately refuted the story, asserting that the U.S. has no secret garage like that and the assertion that B-1 bombers can drop nuclear warheads is false.
					
					 The true nature of the U.S. as the biggest nuclear maniac can never be concealed just as a gimlet inside a plastic bag is bound to protrude.
					
					 An expert on security in Asia commented that the U.S. twitter story proved the north Korean claim that B-1 bomber can drop nuclear weapon, adding this means that in case the U.S. forces fly B-1 bomber to the sky above the Korean peninsula for a drill next time, north Korea can take it as having been loaded with a nuclear weapon.
					
					 It is not secret that B-1B and other nuclear strategic bombers are key force of the U.S. for containing big countries around the Korean peninsula like Russia and China in contingency.
					
					 The NBC reported that the U.S. air force has set up a plan to let B-1B deployed on Guam attack the strategic targets of more than 20 medium and long-range ballistic missile bases, adding the plan can be put into practice by order of Trump.
					
					 Now the U.S. is keeping the posture of mounting sudden attack through the frequent formation flights of B-1B and B-2 to the sky above south Korea while reviving the system of the round-the-clock flight sortie of strategic bomber B-52 equipped with nuclear weapons just as in the period of the Cold War.
					
					 Even in October last the U.S. staged nocturnal flight drills with fighters of the Japan Air "Self-Defense Force" and the south Korean puppet air force after introducing two B-1Bs nuclear-capable strategic bombers into the sky above the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 Through such reckless military provocations as the introduction of B-1B, nuclear submarine and nuclear carriers into the waters off the Korean peninsula, the U.S. dares try to provoke the DPRK and such military acts compel the DPRK to take military counteraction.
					
					 The present situation clearly proves the inevitability of the DPRK's measures for bolstering the nuclear force to cope with the reckless nuclear war provocation of the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 The greater nuclear threat the U.S. poses, the bolder steps the DPRK will take for nuclear deterrence for self-defense.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Stop Nuclear Threat to DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Stop Nuclear Threat to DPRK
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has gone mischievous nowadays to stop the DPRK from making advance as the nuclear force of Juche Korea has almost reached the phase of completion.
					 As the DPRK's action for completing its state nuclear force is becoming a fait accompli, the Trump group is floating the story of "nuclear attack" on the DPRK, trying to make it sound plausible.
					
					 By putting forward those soldiers who retired from service of the nuclear force, the U.S. is opening to public every procedure for executing the nuclear attack. The group is getting vocal that "President Trump would choose a plan already existing on table when he see it as a moment to use a nuclear weapon against north Korea" and that "it is almost impossible to stop the decision".
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. is setting afloat information that it is making actual preparations for a nuclear war with the DPRK as evidenced by the report about the August nuclear bombing drill targeting the DPRK which B-52 of its air force conducted with Japan Air "Self-Defense Force" in areas around the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Such movement of the Trump group is aimed to pressurize the DPRK from taking a measure for completing the building of a nuclear force at the final phase.
					
					 In conclusion, the U.S. had better clearly understand who its rival is.
					
					 If the U.S. is finally going to inflict a nuclear war on the DPRK, by finding fault with the DPRK's self-defensive measure for completing the national nuclear force, the DPRK will not hesitate to respond to it with the nuclear attack to wipe out the U.S., empire of evil, from the earth.
					
					 It seems that the U.S. has lingering attachment for the Caribbean crisis in the 1960s. It will be a grave miscalculation for the U.S. to think that it can revive the Caribbean crisis on the Korean peninsula and bring down the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean peninsula is not the Caribbean region and the Korean People's Army is not such a weak one who would put down its nuclear weapon at the nuclear threat and blackmail of the U.S. The KPA is the invincible and ever-victorious powerful army full of the spirit of annihilating enemies.
					
					 The KPA is a heroic army which wrested surrender documents from the U.S. without nuclear weapons in all forms of confrontation with the U.S. including the 1968 Pueblo incident and the 1976 Panmunjom case.
					
					 No force on the earth can bring into submission the DPRK whose leader, army and people have formed a harmonious whole and it is truth proven by the history of the DPRK-U.S. stand-off that the DPRK will always emerge victorious.
					
					 The DPRK is a dignified nuclear power and a world-level military power and gone are the days never to return when the U.S. used to threaten the DPRK with nuclear weapons.
					
					 Trump had better ponder over the saying that "Give measure for measure".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Working Strategy for General Offensive
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Working Strategy for General Offensive
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A fresh upswing is being effected on all the fronts of the Korean revolution thanks to the invincible working strategy set forth at the Second Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), despite grave difficulties cropped up in our advance, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The working strategy set forth at the above-said plenary meeting is a precious guideline as it clarified the immutable path for us and the main duty for the Korean revolution at present and a militant banner to build up our force and give full display to its might.
					
					 It also serves as a powerful weapon for initiatively and offensively tiding over the present difficulties.
					
					 The WPK is a revolutionary and struggling party and the successive offensive is a working mode and way of advance of the Korean army and people, an embodiment of the offensive spirit of Mt Paektu.
					
					 The offensive of our Party, army and people is a bold charge of braving any hardships and trials without hesitation and a vehement general offensive of advancing toward the higher goal without self-conceit and satisfaction. It is the powerful working way of dashing ahead without the slightest depression, stepping, compromise and concession. Herein lies the militant might and unusual magnetic power of our offensive.
					
					 The article calls upon all the people to work fresh miracles and feats on all the fronts for building a powerful socialist nation and successfully conclude this year's campaign, upholding the said invincible working strategy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Snipes at Trump for Re-listing DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Snipes at Trump for Re-listing DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism"
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- At a recent official meeting of the White House Trump spouted a load of rubbish against the DPRK, announcing the decision to put the DPRK back on the list of "sponsors of terrorism".
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article terms this a bandit-like violent action.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 The DPRK has opposed all forms of terrorism and support for it. It acceded to major international pacts against terrorism and has done its bit as a member of the international community to put a definite end to terrorism.
					
					 The Trump administration's reckless re-designation of the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" is just last-ditch efforts of a pack of rabid dogs unable to hinder the DPRK from finalizing its process for bolstering the state nuclear force.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces' desperate moves to check the advance of the dignified DPRK by re-designating it as a "sponsor of terrorism" under the pretext of "threat" to global peace and security will get them nowhere.
					
					 Such moves only harden the faith of its army and people to take the path chosen by them to the end as it is a right one.
					
					 The Trump cult should bear in mind that it will have to pay dearly for its desperate moves to stifle the DPRK. It should retract its hostile policy toward the DPRK and the above-said re-designation.

articles.title: Papers Brand U.S. as World's Biggest Terrorist Sponsor
articles.content:
Papers Brand U.S. as World's Biggest Terrorist Sponsor
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK Friday carry commentaries condemning Trump for having re-listed the DPRK as a "terrorist sponsor".
					 It is the height of shamelessness and a serious politically-motivated provocation for the U.S. to brand the DPRK as a "terrorist sponsor" even though it is censured as the biggest terrorist sponsor on our planet, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 Terrorism is what makes the rogue state U.S. exist, the paper says, adding the U.S. is the biggest terrorist sponsor and the biggest state-sponsored terrorist universally recognized by the international community.
					
					 The world still mires in the nightmare of terrorism, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 Despite the strong call of the international community against terrorism, it has not yet been eradicated but has become a big trouble as it expands worldwide after going through the boundary of country and region.
					
					 The terrorist organizations throwing the world into uneasiness and horror came into existence at the hands of the U.S.
					
					 What matters more is that the U.S. does not hesitate such brigandish act as assassinating a state leader in broad daylight and bringing down regimes of those countries incurring its displeasure by openly hurling aggression troops, not content with putting political and economic sanctions and pressure on them in every way.
					
					 The world people shudder at the terrorist crimes committed by the U.S. against the DPRK.
					
					 Since the liberation of Korea, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have persisted in political terrorism against the DPRK. Now their moves have reached the hideous assassination terrorism by use of bio-chemical substances.
					
					 Minju Joson also says that the matchless and hideous terrorist criminals who openly commit subversion of state, murder, destruction and plunder in different parts of the world have gone so impudent as to trumpet about re-listing the DPRK as a "terrorist sponsor". The paper stresses that this is the height of the tragedy of the century as it is just like a guilty party filing the suit first.

articles.title: S. Korea: Enactment of Law on Social Disasters Urged
articles.content:
S. Korea: Enactment of Law on Social Disasters Urged
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 21, demanding that a special law on social disasters be enacted, according to Yonhap News.
					 Speakers at the conference said that what people want is to form a powerful and independent special investigation committee for thoroughly probing the truth about the "Sewol" disaster and the humidifier and sterilizer case and punishment of chief culprits.
					
					 They contended that the "National Assembly" has to pass a special law for the probe into truth behind social disasters and the building of a safe society.
					
					 At the end of the press conference, the participants thrust to the NA a document signed by more than 105 000 in demand of a probe into the truth behind disasters.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Communist Party "Russian Communists" on Nov. 14.
					 M. A. Suraikin, chairman of the Party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits and organize political and cultural events on the sixth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- We pay the highest honor to leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Swiss committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il on the sixth anniversary of his demise and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement issued on Nov. 14 to mark the 25th publication anniversary of Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is the Lifeline of Our People".
					
					 The statement noted that his work was published in the grim period when the imperialists and reactionaries were making desperate efforts to stifle socialist Korea, taking advantage of the collapse of socialism in various countries.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il in his work stressed the need to resolutely defend and advance the socialist cause.
					
					 Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses is based on the Juche idea.
					
					 Korean-style socialism regards the people as the most valuable being and their interests as the noblest thing and makes everything serve them, and it has been deeply kept in the mind of the people.
					
					 His work serves as a powerful weapon for the Korean people struggling to defend Juche-based socialism and a historic document that injected new dynamism into the world socialist movement.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Brazilian Organization
Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on a website an article titled "Let's view the DPRK free from bias" on Nov. 3.
					 The article referred to the fact that the documentary film "On the land where the happiest people live" produced by a Russian TV to show the real picture of socialist Korea is drawing attention from audiences of various countries.
					
					 Those who recently visited the DPRK are astonished and excited to see the society fundamentally different from what was told by the West's media, it said, adding:
					
					 It is none other than the Korean people who live in the society whose members help and lead each other and form a harmonious big family with the word "we".
					
					 The Korean people have grasped truth that everything should be made by their own efforts in the course of building socialism.
					
					 The DPRK is now making steady progress. Attractive streets are mushrooming with each passing day and the capacity of factories and enterprises is daily increasing.
					
					 Free education and free medical care systems of higher level are in force and ordinary people are provided with deluxe flats hard to express otherwise and the might of planned economy is displayed to the full.
					
					 The website noted that a Czech newspaper reported, "It will be hard for foreigners to understand the Korean people's boundless trust in their leader. Western politicians only seek their honor but Marshal Kim Jong Un is devoting his all to the country's prosperity and people's happiness. The Korean people guided by the great leader are, indeed, enviable. They are the happiest people in the world".

articles.title: Conversan en La Habana los cancilleres de Corea y Cuba
articles.content:
Conversan en La Habana los cancilleres de Corea y Cuba
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 22 en la sede del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica de Cuba las conversaciones entre el canciller Ri Yong Ho, quien realiza una visita oficial a la Republica de Cuba encabezando la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y su homologo cubano Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla.
					Por la parte coreana, participaron en la ocasion los miembros de la delegacion y el embajador coreano en Cuba y por la cubana, los funcionarios interesados del MINREX.
					
					Los cancilleres de ambos paises expresaron la firme voluntad de seguir consolidando y desarrollando las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Cuba que fueron preparadas por los lideres antecesores y continuan excelentemente por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y el Companero Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					Ri Yong Ho se refirio a la aguda situacion de la Peninsula Coreana creada por las aventureras acciones militares de los imperialistas y subrayo que la RPDC continuara consolidando la defensa nacional frente a la politica hostil y chantaje de EE.UU.
					
					Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla hablo de la lucha de los pueblos por la soberania, la independencia y el derecho a la autodeterminacion, el derecho a establecer los propios sistemas politico, economico, social y cultural y la no intervencion en asuntos internos de otros.
					
					Ambas partes rechazaron categoricamente la arbitrariedad de EE.UU. de incluir otra vez a la RPDC en la lista de "patrocinadores del terrorismo" calificandola de violacion flagrante del derecho internacional.
					
					El mismo dia, el ministro coreano departio con los funcionarios interesados del Departamento Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba, el MINREX de Cuba y las entidades de solidaridad.

articles.title: Jong Nam Hyok comenta la introduccion de propiedades estrategicas de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Jong Nam Hyok comenta la introduccion de propiedades estrategicas de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El investigador del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos (IAN) del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jong Nam Hyok, publico el dia 24 un comentario que revela la peligrosidad de la introduccion de las propiedades estrategicas de EE.UU. en la Peninsula Coreana.
					El chantaje nuclear de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC, que perdura de siglo en siglo, llega hoy dia a la fase mas peligrosa, adelanta el investigador y prosigue:
					
					En menos de un ano desde la investidura del presidente norteamericano Trump, revistio el caracter mas provocativo y peligroso la introduccion de propiedades nucleares de EE.UU. en sus frecuencias, dimension y contenido.
					
					No hay ninguna garantia de que tales movimientos no se extenderan al ataque preventivo nuclear y la guerra total contra la RPDC en cualquier momento.
					
					Detras del despacho sucesivo de dichos medios belicos a la Peninsula Coreana, hay el intento estrategico de controlar con mas rigor a Japon y el Sur de Corea, acelerar la fabricacion de la alianza militar tripartita con ellos y mantener a raya en el plano militar a los rivales potenciales China y Rusia.
					
					Este acto, que perturba la estabilidad regional del Nordeste Asiatico, hace mas acalorada la carrera armamentista en la region.
					
					La escalada de amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. hace sentirnos en carne propia la justeza de la linea de impulsar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares y nos empuja a desarrollar en alto nivel esas ultimas con fines de autodefensa.

articles.title: Efectuado acto por 7o aniversario de triunfo en combate de la isla Yonphyong
articles.content:
Efectuado acto por 7o aniversario de triunfo en combate de la isla Yonphyong
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 23 en el distrito de Kangryong, provincia de Hwawnghae del Sur, el mitin de militares y civiles para celebrar el 7o aniversario de la victoria en el canonazo contra la isla Yonphyong.
					Participaron en el acto los oficiales y soldados del EPC inclusive los uniformados participantes en esa batalla, los funcionarios y los trabajadores de diversos estratos del mencionado distrito. 
					
					El coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Song Guk, jefe del 4o cuerpo del EPC, dijo que la victoria en esa batalla deviene un gran evento que demostro a todo el mundo el impetu invencible del EPC y un acontecimiento registrado con letras doradas en los anales de victoria de Corea del Juche. 
					
					Prosiguio que los oficiales y soldados, encargados de la defensa de la zona mas candente del frente suroeste de la patria, estan decididos a asestar un golpe inmediato y despiadado si se les da la orden y convertir la zona maritima suroeste en la tumba de los enemigos continuando la tradicion del triunfo de la batalla de Yonphyong. 
					
					En su discurso, Kim Pong Hyon, presidente del Comite del PTC en el distrito de Kangryong, felicito calurosamente a los triunfadores de la batalla y agrego que si los yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos se atreven a lanzar una chispa contra nuestra tierra y nuestro mar los pobladores aniquilaran despiadadamente a los enemigos luchando en la misma trinchera con los uniformados 
					
					A continuacion, hubo intervenciones. 
					
					Terminado el acto, hubo el concierto y la marcha de la banda militar del EPC.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe dejar de amenazar a la RPDC con guerra nuclear: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe dejar de amenazar a la RPDC con guerra nuclear: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En estos tiempos, EE.UU. se porta con bajeza para impedir la inminente conclusion definitiva de la construccion de fuerzas armadas nucleares de la Corea del Juche.
					Cuando se va a convertirse en hecho consumado la adopcion de nuestras medidas de accion para ese fin, la banda de Trump difunde los rumores para hacer creible su teoria de "ataque nuclear" contra nuestro pais.
					
					Al publicar en la prensa por conducto de los uniformados retirados, que servian en las fuerzas armadas nucleares de EE.UU., el procedimiento de ejecucion de ataque nuclear, ellos especificaron que "si el presidente Trump decide que es el momento de usar el arma nuclear contra el Norte de Corea, escogera el proyecto existente ya sobre la mesa" y "es casi imposible suspender esa decision".
					
					Por otra parte, EE.UU. circula las informaciones de los preparativos reales para la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC como la realizacion en los alrededores de la Peninsula Coreana del entrenamiento de bombardeo nuclear anti-RPDC con las "Fuerzas Aereas de Autodefensa" de Japon.
					
					En una palabra, tal movimiento persigue el objetivo de presionar a la RPDC con la amenaza de guerra nuclear para que ella no tome la ultima medida para completar la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					A adelantar la conclusion, el imperio yanqui debe actuar con prudencia conociendo bien a su rival.
					
					Si EE.UU. impone la guerra nuclear cuestionando las medidas autodefensivas de la RPDC para completar las fuerzas nucleares, la segunda respondera sin vacilacion alguna con el ataque nuclear irremediable para el primero y eliminara este imperio del mal de la faz de la tierra.
					
					Seria un error fatal si EE.UU. piensa que puede poner de rodillas a la RPDC reproduciendo en la Peninsula Coreana la Crisis del Caribe en que pudo salir con la suya en la decada de 1960.
					
					La Peninsula Coreana no es el Mar Caribe y ademas, el invencible Ejercito Popular de Corea no es el grupo de los debiles quienes deponen armas nucleares doblegandose ante el chantaje nuclear del imperio yanqui.
					
					Ese heroico cuerpo armado ya habia obtenido las actas de capitulacion de EE.UU. en diferentes formas de enfrentamiento tales como el caso del barco espia armado "Pueblo" de 1968 y el incidente de Phanmunjom de 1976.
					
					En este mundo no hay la fuerza que pueda doblegar a la invencible RPDC donde el lider, el partido y las masas estan unidos monoliticamente y la victoria de ella es la verdad que ensena la historia de confrontacion con EE.UU.
					
					Hoy dia, nuestro Estado es la digna potencia nuclear y la militar de talla mundial.
					
					Ya paso el tiempo en que EE.UU. amenazaba unilateralmente a la RPDC con armas nucleares.
					
					Trump debe recordar este dicho: el que prefiere el fuego, muere quemado.

articles.title: Es inevitable el incremento de fuerzas nucleares de la RPDC: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Es inevitable el incremento de fuerzas nucleares de la RPDC: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 24 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, quedo publicado en Twitter un articulo del circulo militar norteamericano, segun el cual EE.UU. tiene el deposito subterraneo de ojivas nucleares y los bombarderos B-1 son capaces de lanzar bombas nucleares. 
					Para remediar las consecuencias negativas del articulo, EE.UU. lo describe como "erroneo" y "opinion falsa" por conducto de los medios de prensa y los especialistas.
					
					El pasado dia 16, el sitio Web VOX reporto que el articulo en cuestion fue publicado el dia 15 en Twitter por la comandancia encargada del arsenal nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					El problema es que contradicen inmediatamente ese articulo los medios de prensa y los expertos norteamericanos evaluandolo como "criterio falso".
					
					Pero, no se puede disimular de ninguna manera el atributo del maniaco de guerra nuclear no.1 del mundo.
					
					Un experto asiatico de seguridad opino que el polemico articulo confirmo la insistencia del Norte de Corea en que los B-1 tambien pueden arrojar bombas atomicas.
					
					Agrego que si los B-1 sobrevuelan la proxima vez la Peninsula Coreana para los ejercicios militares, esto significa que el Norte de Corea puede creer que esos aparatos estan cargados de armas nucleares.
					
					No es secreto que las principales fuerzas armadas de EE.UU. para mantener a raya en el tiempo de emergencia a las potencias perifericas de la Peninsula Coreana, inclusive Rusia y China, son los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares tales como B-1B.
					
					La cadena norteamericana NBC informo que las fuerzas aereas norteamericanas ya elaboraron el plan de atacar con los B-1B desplegados en la isla Guam mas de 20 blancos estrategicos, o sea, las bases de misiles balisticos de mediano y largo alcances, y este plan puede ser ejecutado cuando lo ordene Trump.
					
					Al igual que el periodo de la Guerra Fria, EE.UU. rehabilito el sistema de despegue de emergencia de 24 horas de los B-52 y mantiene el estado de ataque sorpresivo mediante los frecuentes vuelos en escuadrilla de los B-1B y B-2.
					
					En octubre pasado, las dos aeronaves tipo B-1B realizaron por separados en el firmamento sobre el Mar Este de Corea los ejercicios de vuelo nocturno con los cazas de las fuerzas aereas surcoreanas y de las "Fuerzas Aereas de Autodefensa" de Japon.
					
					Ahora, el imperio americano despacha a las aguas perifericas de la Peninsula Coreana los bombarderos estrategicos B-1B, submarinos y portaaviones nucleares para provocar a la RPDC y esta locura militar obliga a ella a tomar contramedidas militares.
					
					La situacion actual comprueba lo inevitable del incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC frente a las imprudentes tentativas de EE.UU. y sus satelites de desatar la guerra nuclear.
					
					Mientras se torne mas brutal la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., se consolidara aun mas el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC.
